content: I think I'll get Luna the Kong Wobbler and the Hide-a-Squirrel to start with. I've heard great things about Kong toys, and the Hide-a-Squirrel looks like it'll be a lot of fun for her. By the way, I've been meaning to wash Luna's bedding again because it's getting a bit smelly. Do you have any tips on how to wash and dry cat bedding properly?
